thread.section_title: Figo Pet Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Figo Pet Insurance | figopetinsurance.com
thread.title: Sue
thread.title_full: Figo Pet Insurance reviewed by Sue

author: Sue
title: Sue
text: The customer service at Figo is excellent. Every agent I've spoken to has been very patient, cheerful and knowledgeable. Judy Pacheco was the agent who I spoke to when I was gathering information. She spent so much time with me and never once did I get the feeling she was becoming impatient. I really appreciated that and felt secure that Figo was the insurance company I wanted to deal with. By being able to get all the information I needed and by making me feel so welcome, I decided to sign on with Figo with Judy.
